title: Syberia
notes: Needs to be run in a window otherwise it's just black screen with sound (known problem with the game). Solution: Making a player.ini file in the game folder, with "800 600 32 0 BaseCMO.cmo" inside.

notes: Runs in a window, since the game is native 800×600.

title: Syberia
notes: Starts, has sound, but screen is black

title: Syberia
notes: Works only in window mode by adding a player.ini file containing the string "800 600 32 0 BaseCMO.cmo". Black screen otherwise. The display is too tiny on a high resolution screen to my taste, sadly. Seems to work perfectly otherwise

title: Syberia
notes:
A player.ini file needs to be created in the syberia folder with the following line: 
800 600 32 0 BaseCMO.cmo

title: Syberia
